name: Ice Queen Adventure
description:
"Ice Queen Adventure" is a game of adventure and action whose purpose is to help the princess collect her coins and diamonds lost in the palace.

So, what are you waiting for to download your copy "Ice Queen Adventure" and play before whole friends.

In "Ice Queen Adventure" you will also find:

+ Music and sound effects.
+ Magnificent high-resolution graphics.
+ The game is free, no purchase required.
